channel.title: What's a good free webhost? (unlimited bandwidth is a must for me)
channel.description:
i want to run some websites are there any hosts with unlimited bandwidth and preferably offshore that anyone knows of? I've looked and found a few, registered, and I am using them, but im trying to find as many resources as possible as i build these websites for friends and family to host files and forums.
You're insight and help is appreciated!

item.title: What's a good free webhost? (unlimited bandwidth is a must for me)
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Its usually subject to fair use policy… Also, they can’t give you ‘unlimited’ bandwidth as its IMPOSSIBLE to support unlimited bandwidth. Just saying…

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good free webhost? (unlimited bandwidth is a must for me)

item.title: What's a good free webhost? (unlimited bandwidth is a must for me)
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

unlimited bandwidth comes with a catch always… Most of the time the catch is you’re on a low speed connection either 10mb/s or 100mb/s. I suggest you take the smart road and go with a host that gives you a higher speed connection so when your website does get under load it won’t get fucked over.

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good free webhost? (unlimited bandwidth is a must for me)

item.title: What's a good free webhost? (unlimited bandwidth is a must for me)
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

000a.biz unlimited bandwith and free but not that good

item.source: What's a good free webhost? (unlimited bandwidth is a must for me)

item.title: What's a good free webhost? (unlimited bandwidth is a must for me)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

tranomo:

paha, really? i’ve got several accounts on sites with unlimited bandwidth i just need MORE sites than the ones i’ve already found. I’m expanding as many resources as possible, i’ve got a 356kb text file of website names i use for hosts, tutorials, shopping, and entertainment. If you don’t understand or if you can’t help i’d rather you not call me a “poor hipster”. What if im just a “tightwad jew”? i really don’t care if it’s really unlimited or not, i just dont want the site to actually limit my bandwidth lmfao.

they’ll limit regardless if they advertise it as unlimited or not

you can buy hosting with 100gb transfer limits per month for dirt cheap and I’ll guarantee it’s unlikely you’ll exceed it

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good free webhost? (unlimited bandwidth is a must for me)

item.title: What's a good free webhost? (unlimited bandwidth is a must for me)
item.dc:creator: @Disorder Disorder
item.description:
@Disorder wrote:

Even for the paid hosts “unlimited bandwidth” doesn’t mean UNLIMITED. And now you want a free host with unlimited bandwidth. Pay for it, you poor hipster.

Read full topic
